name: LD47 - The Looping Legend ( POST JAM )
name_original: LD47 - The Looping Legend ( POST JAM )
description:
Controls: W, A, S, D - Movement Space - Shoot ( can be held down )

P - Pause game

IMPORTANT: The sound settings may need multiple clicks to register - Other controls are displayed in-game

Description:
Your plane got stuck in the up position and now you're gonna have to dog-fight other planes while in a bit of a pickle.
- Disclaimer, the game is a little hard, but the pickups should help, I had to make it hard as I was running out of time.

FIXED:

  • Fullscreen is not disabled on restart.
  •  Hit detection reworked.
  • Some graphical errors fixed.
  •  Added tips on death screen.
  • Musics is now back on restarted games
  • Mega-kill bonus score of 100 added
